price: 41. Prête une oreille attentive, le jour où le héraut (de l’Heure) appellera d’un lieu tout proche.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
